General.Name: Wuhan DDMC Culture Co Ltd
General.Description: Wuhan Ddmc Culture & Sports Co.,Ltd. operates in film, television, and sports industries in China and internationally. The company offers TV series, film investment, production and distribution, program production, advertising, artist brokerage, cinema investment and management, and develops film related and television derivative products. It also engages in the sports business, including sports copyright distribution, sports marketing, sports product subscription, sports brokers, etc. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Wuhan, China.

4.Name: Ms. Xiao Yang Yu
4.Title: Admin. Mang. and Employee Representative Member of Supervisory Board
